item.title: 法国市场回到政治风波之前的状态
item.description: 在埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）总统任命新总理前的几个小时，法国市场已从本周的政治风波中恢复过来。【原文：French markets have mostly recovered from the ructions of this week’s political drama, hours before President Emmanuel Macron names a new prime minister.】

item.title: 阿拉伯联合银行计划出售 8 亿美元坏账
item.description: 阿拉伯联合银行（United Arab Bank PJSC）正在探索出售大约 8 亿美元的坏账，熟悉此事的人士称，这是海湾地区最近一家试图清理资产负债表的银行。【原文：United Arab Bank PJSC is exploring the sale of roughly $800 million in bad debt, people familiar with the matter said, the latest Gulf bank attempting to clean up its balance sheet.】

item.title: 中国将对美国船只征收港口费以示报复
item.description: 中国将开始对停靠在其港口的美国船只征收特别费用，从而使长达数月之久的争端明显升级。【原文：China will start levying special fees on American ships docking at its ports, significantly escalating a months-long dispute in which Washington has targeted the Asian country for its maritime and trade dominance.】

item.title: 奇货可居：当美国被日本恐慌吞噬时（播客）
item.description: 这些天来，人们一直在担心中国及其占主导地位的公司会吃掉美国的经济午餐。当然，这并不是我们历史上第一次担心亚洲工业强国的崛起。20 世纪 80 年代和 90 年代初，人们对日本企业的崛起忧心忡忡。从《虎胆龙威》到迈克尔-克莱顿的小说《旭日东升》，这种担忧在电影和流行文化中随处可见。这次有一个很大的不同：中国【原文：These days, there’s a non-stop drumbeat of concern that China and its dominant companies will eat America’s economic lunch, so to speak. item.title: 油价暴跌，马来西亚国家石油公司分红将减少 38
item.description: 马来西亚国家石油公司（Petroliam Nasional Bhd.【原文：Petroliam Nasional Bhd.’s dividend payout to the Malaysian government is set to decline by 38% next year as an oil price slump weighs on the state-owned oil and gas company’s profitability.】

item.title: 税收取代石油收入，安瓦尔旨在削减马来西亚赤字
item.description: 马来西亚总理安瓦尔-易卜拉欣（Anwar Ibrahim）计划削减更多补贴，改善税收，以缩小明年的预算赤字。【原文：Malaysian Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim plans to cut more subsidies and improve tax collection to narrow the budget deficit next year, as he grapples with lower petroleum-related revenue and dimming economic prospects.】

item.title: 华尔街为何痴迷于贬值交易
item.description: 包括美国、法国和日本在内的一些世界最大经济体的政治和财政不确定性，以及这对其货币造成的压力，令投资者感到紧张。【原文：Political and fiscal uncertainty in some of the world’s biggest economies — including the US, France and Japan — and the pressure that puts on their currencies are making investors nervous.】

item.title: 日本统治集团崩溃将助日元一臂之力，并打击股市：策略师
item.description: 日本公明党结束了与执政党自民党的联合，导致日经 225 指数期货下跌，日元升值。【原文：Japan’s Komeito party has ended its coalition with the ruling Liberal Democratic Party, sending the Nikkei 225 futures down and boosting the yen.】

item.title: 泰国央行行长意外按兵不动后认为仍有放宽空间
item.description: 泰国央行行长威泰-拉塔那空（Vitai Ratanakorn）表示，泰国央行仍有政策空间来下调已经是世界最低基准利率之一的基准利率。【原文：Governor Vitai Ratanakorn said the Bank of Thailand still has policy space to cut a benchmark interest rate that is already among the world’s lowest.】

item.title: 贷款到期在即，Gaw Capital 就贷款方案举行会谈
item.description: 在下个月即将到期之际，专注于房地产的私募股权公司 Gaw Capital Partners 正在争分夺秒地为与上海房地产相关的 3.7 亿美元贷款进行再融资或展期。【原文：Real estate focused private equity firm Gaw Capital Partners is racing to refinance or extend $370 million in loans tied to properties in Shanghai as maturities loom next month.】

item.title: 交易员认为印度财报季最平静，因为他们看淡了 TCS
item.description: 塔塔咨询服务有限公司（Tata Consultancy Services Ltd.）的财报令人失望，但这并没有吓到市场，因为交易员们押注印度主要股票指数公司在本报告季的走势将趋于平缓。【原文：Tata Consultancy Services Ltd.’s earnings disappointment has failed to spook the market as traders bet on subdued moves among companies in India’s main equity index this reporting season.】

item.title: 保证金准入下调引发中国高价芯片股下滑
item.description: 由于投资者对估值过高和利润率下降的担忧与日俱增，高歌猛进的中国芯片制造商股票周五暴跌。【原文：High-flying Chinese chipmaker stocks tumbled Friday as mounting concerns over lofty valuations and reported margin cuts soured investor sentiment.】

item.title: 高盛分析师下调欧元银行评级至 "减持"，因其价格过高
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Analysts at Goldman Sachs Group Inc. have cut their recommendation on euro-denominated high-grade bonds by banks to underweight, less than three months after ending their overweight on the sector.】

item.title: 政策制定者权衡国内价格风险，捷克通胀放缓
item.description: 捷克的通胀率在 9 月份放缓至五个月来最弱的速度，但国内价格压力可能会使央行对降息保持谨慎。【原文：Czech inflation slowed in September to the weakest pace in five months but domestic price pressures are likely to keep the central bank cautious about lowering interest rates.】

item.title: 资产 "全面下跌"，新兴市场下跌
item.description: 金价回落和美国政府长期停摆削弱了投资者的情绪，新兴市场资产下跌，因为投资者放弃了一些风险。【原文：Emerging market assets declined as investors took some risk off the table, with sentiment dented by a retreat in gold prices and a prolonged US government shutdown.】

item.title: 欧洲天然气流量缓解需求风险，重返长达数周的波动区间
item.description: 由于燃料供应稳定，暂时抵消了寒冷天气的风险，交易商正在等待供暖季将如何发展的进一步线索，欧洲天然气价格又回到了数周来的交易区间。【原文：European natural gas prices have snapped back into a range they were trading in for weeks as traders wait for further clues on how the heating season will unfold, with steady fuel supplies offsetting cold weather risks for now.】

item.title: 哈萨克斯坦将关键利率上调至 18% 的历史新高以抑制通胀
item.description: 哈萨克斯坦将借贷成本提高到历史最高水平，因为在雄心勃勃的经济增长计划中，官员们正在努力抑制通货膨胀。【原文：Kazakhstan increased borrowing costs to the highest on record as officials battle to tame inflation amid ambitious plans to grow the economy.】

item.title: 人工智能推动印度顶级私营企业 TCS 裁员创纪录
item.description: 塔塔咨询服务有限公司（Tata Consultancy Services Ltd.）进行了有史以来最大幅度的裁员，原因是与美国的关系紧张以及向人工智能的快速转变重塑了该国价值 2,800 亿美元的 IT 服务行业。【原文：Tata Consultancy Services Ltd. made its steepest-ever job cuts as strained ties with the US and a rapid shift toward artificial intelligence reshape the country’s $280 billion IT services sector.】

item.title: 真正的人工智能风险在于 "不入流 "的技术会抢走工作机会，让我们所有人都感到厌烦
item.description:
当人工智能的末日场景沉浸在超级智能机器人霸主带来的风险中时，一位诺贝尔经济学奖得主却在担心一种更平凡的可能性。【原文：

While AI doomsday scenarios dwell on the risks posed by superintelligent robot overlords, one Nobel-Prize winning economist fears a more mundane possibility.

】

item.title: 公明党称日本数十年之久的执政联盟将分裂
item.description: 自民党佐佐江-高市（Sanae Takaichi）的小伙伴公明党（Komeito）领导人称，由于双方未能克服在政治资金监管问题上的分歧，日本执政联盟已经瓦解。【原文：Japan’s ruling coalition has collapsed, according to the leader of Komeito, the junior partner to Sanae Takaichi’s Liberal Democratic Party, after the two sides failed to overcome their differences on political funding regulation.】

item.title: 维勒鲁瓦称法国 2026 年赤字应在国内生产总值的 4.8%以内
item.description: 法国央行行长弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）表示，下届政府必须克服政治内讧，继续以大幅削减明年的预算赤字为目标。【原文：Bank of France Governor Francois Villeroy de Galhau said the next government must overcome political infighting and continue to target a significant reduction in the budget deficit next year.】

item.title: 挪威核心通胀率在停滞三个月后放缓
item.description: 挪威的基本通胀率降至四个月来的最低水平，这很可能会助长人们对挪威央行保持进一步宽松政策的预期。【原文：Norway’s underlying inflation rate declined to its lowest level in four months, likely fueling expectations for the central bank to keep the door open to further easing.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市将重新下跌，英镑保持稳定
BD 报告称，内陆港将削减南非主要高速公路的卡车流量
item.description: 据《商业日报》（Business Day）报道，在南非最富裕的省份拟建一个耗资 500 亿兰特（约合 29 亿美元）的内陆港口，可将该国最繁忙的高速公路之一的卡车交通流量减少三分之一。【原文：A proposed 50 billion-rand ($2.9 billion) inland port in South Africa’s wealthiest province could cut truck traffic on one of the country’s busiest freeways by one-third, Business Day reported.】

item.title: Klarna 首席执行官称，人工智能就业冲击即将到来，而企业尚未做好准备
item.description: 人工智能在金融领域的最大支持者之一表示，从技术公司到翻译，世界还没有正视人工智能消灭大量工作岗位的后果。【原文：From technology firms to translators, the world has not faced up to the consequences of artificial intelligence wiping out swathes of jobs, according to one of AI’s biggest cheerleaders in finance.】

item.title: 随着交易量激增，TP ICAP 加密货币交易所将增加稳定币交易对
item.description: TP ICAP Group Plc 的加密货币现货交易所计划开始提供稳定币交易对，因为该平台的交易量增长反映了数字资产的广泛繁荣。【原文：TP ICAP Group Plc’s crypto spot trading exchange plans to start offering stablecoin trading pairs, as volume growth on the platform mirrors the wider boom in digital assets.】

item.title: 世界上最年长的统治者希望获得喀麦隆的新任期，令投资者感到震惊
item.description: 世界上最年长的总统保罗-比亚希望统治喀麦隆至少到 99 岁。【原文：Paul Biya, the world’s oldest president, wants to rule Cameroon at least until he’s 99. That has investors worried about strife in the African nation prone to conflict.】

item.title: 软银正在洽谈以 Arm 股票为后盾的 50 亿美元保证金贷款
item.description: 软银集团公司（SoftBank Group Corp. ）正在与全球银行洽谈 50 亿美元的借款，在孙正义（Masayoshi Son）加快这家日本投资公司在人工智能领域的押注之际，为其金库注入新的资金。【原文：SoftBank Group Corp. is in talks to borrow $5 billion from global banks, refilling its coffers at a time Masayoshi Son is accelerating the Japanese investment firm’s bets on artificial intelligence.】

item.title: WeWork 3.38 亿美元印度上市后首次交易股价下跌
item.description: WeWork India Management Ltd. 在孟买的首次公开募股未能吸引到富裕投资者和散户投资者，导致该公司在孟买的首次交易中下跌。【原文：WeWork India Management Ltd. fell during its Mumbai trading debut after the company’s initial public offering failed to attract wealthy and retail investors.】
